titles.title: Honoring, on the occasion of his eightieth birthday, the life and six decades of public service of Jacob Birnbaum and especially his commitment to freeing Soviet Jews from religious, cultural, and communal extinction.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Africa, Global Human Rights and International Operations.

committee.subcommittee: Africa, Global Human Rights and International Operations
committee.name: House International Relations

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 9/28/2006--Introduced. Honors the life and public service of Jacob Birnbaum on the occasion of his 80th birthday, especially his commitment to freeing Soviet Jews from religious, cultural, and communal extinction.
